member_sentences.sentence: The electricity generation in the United States has barely increased since 2000.
Since 2000, gas power and wind power and solar power have taken much of the share from coal power in the United States.
The total electricity generation in the world has increased by more than 10 million GWh since 2000.
The electricity generation in China accounts for about 8 million GWh of this increase.
The electricity generation in India accounts for about 1 million GWh of this increase.
The worldwide nuclear electricity generation has barely changed since 2000.
The worldwide hydroelectric generation has about doubled since 2000.
The worldwide wind generation and solar generation increased from about 0 GWh to about 3 million GWh since 2000.
The worldwide gas generation increased from about 3 million GWh to about 6 million GWh since 2000.
The worldwide coal generation increased from about 5 million GWh to about 8 million GWh since 2000.
I wonder why the electricity generation in China has increased so much since 2000.
I wonder why the electricity generation in the United States has changed so little since 2000.
China has been developing since 2000.
The electricity generation in China increased by more than a factor of 5 since 2000.
I think that this increase seems absurd.

I wonder whether China imported electricity before China generated this electricity.

We know that nuclear energy is safe.
We know that nuclear energy is reliable.
The world wants to move towards renewable energy.
The worldwide consumption of fossil fuels is still increasing.
